yam durakata ho ema wedanawan palanaya karagannata shakthiya labenu atha.budurajanan wahanse ek awasthawaka mese deshana kalaha.“diso disan yanthan kayira weri wapana werinan michcha panihithan chiththan papiyo nan thatho kare”sathurek sathurakuta karana wipathakata wada, wairakkarayek wairi pudgalayakuta karana wiruddhakamakata wada waradawa pihituwana lada sitha ohu ithama pawiteku bawata pathkarayi.apa ge sitha ragayen, dweshayen, mada manayen, eershyawen pirunu thanak bawata path kara ganne nam sathurek sathurakuta karana karadarayakata wada ohu ge sitha ohuta karadarayak sidu karayi.wairi pudgalayek wairi pudgalayakuta karana winashayata wada barapathala winashayak, wiruddhakamak ohu ge sitha wisin sidu karanu labayi.
